thread.title: Potential Chelsea transfer target Romelu Lukaku contract extension talks with Everton stall again — report
thread.title_full: Potential Chelsea transfer target Romelu Lukaku contract extension talks with Everton stall again — report

author: David Pasztor
title: Potential Chelsea transfer target Romelu Lukaku contract extension talks with Everton stall again — report
text: Potential Chelsea transfer target Romelu Lukaku contract extension talks with Everton stall again — report The latest on the Lukaku situation Rec Photo by Alex Livesey/Getty Images Today in Romelu Lukaku news, we have more of the same, but a bit stronger. This one comes from Paul Joyce of The Times , whose brief report simply states that Lukaku’s contract extension talks have stalled , again, despite his agent Mino Raiola claiming back in December that a new deal had been worked out 99.9 per cent . Everton’s offer is said to be £140,000 per week, but some claim that it also includes an £80m release clause. Perhaps it is negotiations over this clause that are causing the delay, though Lukaku was supposed to have been given a new contract after the summer window already. Something’s afoot. 76 – Most PL goals scored before turning 24 years old. Owen - 110
